actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend subsection (b) (1) of section 415 of title 38, United States Code, to increase the maximum annual income limitation governing payment of dependency and indemnity compensation to certain parents.

summary.text: Increases the maximum annual income limitation governing payment of dependency and indemnity compensation to the parent of a deceased veteran to $5,000, if the parent is an unremarried widow with a child. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 4l5 (b) (1))

titles.title: A bill to amend subsection (b) (1) of section 415 of title 38, United States Code, to increase the maximum annual income limitation governing payment of dependency and indemnity compensation to certain parents.
